name: Sela the Dragon Lady (Demo)
description:
After the Trolls have stolen all of the food from the dragons, it's up to one half-dragon with a big tummy and an even bigger heart to kick some buff butt in this Spyro inspired platformer.

This is a very short demo, with a sample level, as well as a testing stage in order to get a feel for the future of the game, as well as to gather feedback for the movement, designs, as well as enemy interactions.

As of now, Sela is unable to take actual damage, swim, nor have any of the weight gaining systems been implemented. But you can look forward to those in future updates, as well as additional levels to explore and enemies to defeat.


(The game does not support PS4 controller input, only Xbox/xinput controllers)

Sela Dev Team :

BeanMChocolate - Game Concept, Environmental Artist

IceDev - Project Lead, Programmer, Character Designer, Modeller, and Animator

INAFQUEEN - Music Production, Sound Design, Composer, Proofreader

Featuring the Voice Talents of CoffeeCakeDemon

If you're interested in joining the SelaDev team, you can message IceDevGames on Twitter, or send an email to contact@icedevgames.com.  We're always looking for talent to help expand Sela's widening world!
